description: Presents the strongest possible version of an argument or position, even those the AI might not agree with. This decorator opposes strawman fallacies by ensuring each viewpoint is represented in its most compelling and charitable form.

parameters.name: sides
parameters.description: Number of different viewpoints to steel-man

parameters.name: critique
parameters.description: Whether to include critique after presenting the steel-manned arguments

parameters.name: separation
parameters.description: Whether to clearly separate the steel-manned presentations from any analysis

examples.description: Steel-manning both sides of a controversial issue
examples.usage:
+++Steelman
Is universal basic income a good policy?
examples.result: Presents the strongest possible cases both for and against universal basic income, with each position articulated in its most compelling form

examples.description: Steel-manning one position with subsequent critique
examples.usage:
+++Steelman(sides=1, critique=true, separation=true)
What is the strongest case for cryptocurrency as the future of finance?
examples.result: Provides the most compelling possible argument for cryptocurrency as the future of finance, clearly separated from a subsequent balanced critique
